about.text: I have experience in organising the work of online stores, integrating and configuring new modern technologies that help in business. For the last 7 years, I have been working as a project manager. In 2025, I successfully completed front-end developer courses and plan to continue working in programming, web application development, online stores, CRM, etc. I plan to develop in this direction, so I am considering offers in the field of front-end development.
